extendedInfo.description: Can I get you a word in edgewise? Are you genetically blessed with an edge in words? If you're, please play Word Edge!!In Word Edge, your goal is to smartly morph a start word to an end word by changing the word one letter at a time. All the intermediate words have to be legitimate English words. Do it in equal or fewer steps than required to score golden trophies.If you are tired of all the Scrabble clones, hidden word clones and Acronym-like gameplay, Word Edge will be a thoroughly refreshing experience for you.Features:- Complete a mind-boggling set of 240 levels across 3 categories. I'll regularly update the game with more levels if I receive a lot of good ratings. If you like an ad-free, paid version, let me know as well :).- Compete on leaderboards with the best players from around the world.Word Edge is brought to you by the creator behind many other innovative games, namely Letter Hound, Spell Quest, Beautiful Worm, Number Pharaoh, Primary, Word Bridge, Kungfu Brain, Digi Crush, Super Math Invaders and Memon's Quest.Keywords: Crossword, Bookworm, Scrabble, Scramble, Word, Morph, Hidden, Boggle, Scramble, Spelltower, Power, WordpressCrossword, Bookworm, Scrabble, Scramble, Word, Morph, Hidden, Boggle, Scramble, Spelltower, Power, WordpressCrossword, Bookworm, Scrabble, Scramble, Word, Morph, Hidden, Boggle, Scramble, Spelltower, Power, WordpressCrossword, Bookworm, Scrabble, Scramble, Word, Morph, Hidden, Boggle, Scramble, Spelltower, Power, WordpressCrossword, Bookworm, Scrabble, Scramble, Word, Morph, Hidden, Boggle, Scramble, Spelltower, Power, Wordpress

reviews.title: Awsome.
reviews.comment: Love word games and thout that the vidio was cool.
reviews.author: Michelle Alexander

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Needs graphical improvements and could work faster on older devices, but in general it is challenging and fun to play.  Also 270 levels for free is stunning, well done.
reviews.author: Daniel Johnston

reviews.title: Really good game
reviews.comment: Works smoothly on the Nexus. A lovely simple but challenging game that is great fun. Would agree that the graphics could do with a bit of work but it doesn\'t detract much. Good stuff.
reviews.author: M Wilson
